attributes.comment:
I am writing to comment on the proposal entitled "Adjustment of the Immigration
Benefit Application/ Petition and Biometric Fee Schedule" also known as Docket
ID USCIS-2006-0044 by the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Service. With the
extremely high cost of adoption a rate increase of up 66% would crip the
opportunities for families such as mine. There is no way that hard working
Americans can afford to pay this huge increase. I ask that the USCIS NOT
increase these rates due to the negative impact it will have on an already
expensive venture. This is an outragous increase and will negatively impact the
number of people attempting to rescue children from horrible situations in
developing countries. Again, please do NOT increase the fees. Thank you for
taking public comments before making a decision that will impact so many
Americans and children around the world.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Chadwick Gray
